AUTHOR: Redjumpman
INSTALL_MSG:
This cog requires Tabulate.
 Type pip3 install tabulate in cmd prompt to install this library.
PM me at Redjumpman#2375 on Discord if you have issues.
NAME: Shop
SHORT: Allows server owner to create a shop
DESCRIPTION:
Users can buy/gift/redeem items created by an Admin.
Admins can change the shop name and add/remove items from the shop and monitor the pending list.
